FuncDef: This command applies an OAM template to an MPLS-TP working or protect path. It contains configuration parameters for proactive OAM mechanisms that can be enabled on the path; for example, BFD. Configuration of an OAM template is optional.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a text string name for the template up to 32 characters in printable 7-bit ASCII, enclosed in double quotes.
